title: Pull-ups Energy
review: Start with 5-10 Normal Pull-Ups.If unable to do pull-ups use band or try hanging for min 15 sec to max (This covers both Newbies + Fitness folks).Gym rats add weight or 12-17 rep count
name: challenge 1

title: Burpees Folks
review: okay you have to do Burpees on this/any brick 20 reps 4 sets.Have 30-60 sec rest b/t sets and at the end hit your 3lr water goal.SHeeeerrr
name: challenge 2
